head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WICKERSHAM, REV. DR. GEORGE W. II

identified-content.person: WICKERSHAM, REV. DR. GEORGE W. II

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WICKERSHAM, REV. DR. GEORGE W. II

block.p: WICKERSHAM-Rev. Dr. George W. II. Of Rockbridge Baths, VA. on September 9th, 2000 at age 87. Husband of Elizabeth Craighill, father of Nancy Leonhard and the late George W. III. Also survived by three grandchildren and four great-grandchildren. Former Rector of parishes in Norristown, PA., Tamworth, N.H., and Hot Springs, VA; honorary associate of TrinitySt. John's Church, Hewlett and Honorary Canon Emeritus of Cathedral of St. John Divine. U.S. Marine Chaplain in World War II. Memorial service Sunday, September 24, at 12:30 at Trinity-St. John's Church, 1142 Broadway, Hewlett, L.I. In lieu of flowers contributions may be given to Friends of Salisbury Cathedral, 6 The Close, Salisbury, Wiltshire, SP12EF, England.
